Plot: In the aftermath of his girlfriend's mysterious death, a young man awakens to find strange horns sprouting from his temples.
Title: Horns
Writer: Keith Bunin (screenplay), Joe Hill (based on the novel by)
Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Max Minghella, Joe Anderson, Juno Temple
tomatoConsensus: Horns is a bit of a tonal jumble, but it offers enough thoughtful horror-comedy -- and strong work from Daniel Radcliffe -- to hook genre enthusiasts.
